text:
Payment Approved (paymentapproved.com) is hiring an IOS and an Android developer. Our offices are in downtown Austin, TX.

- IOS developer More info: http://www.paymentapproved.com/ios-developer

- Android developer More info: http://www.paymentapproved.com/android-developer

We're well-funded and offer competitive salaries, benefits, flexible hours and vacation policies.

No remote workers, no recruiters.
